item.description:
Snow Tubing with lots of Hot Chocolate & whip cream !

How bout we meet at 730, leave at 8 am and get up there around 930 to hit the slopes for two hours. Meet for a picnic lunch then head back out for another two hours of tubing.

If we get 15 or more people we can get the group rate which is $17 for two hours of tubing.

Those who are meeting at my house in Wareham - let me know who you are and I will send directions to my house the day before the event.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Snow Tubing @ Nashoba Valley - Kid Friendly
